92  /**
93   * <p>Instances of this class can validate objects based on declared constraints.
94   * Constraints can either be declared using OVal's constraint annotations, XML configuration
95   * files or EJB3 JPA annotations.</p>
96   * 
97   * <p>This class is thread-safe.</p>
98   * 
99   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
100  * @see AnnotationsConfigurer
101  * @see JPAAnnotationsConfigurer
102  * @see POJOConfigurer
103  * @see XMLConfigurer
104  */
105 public class Validator implements IValidator
106 {
107 	protected static final class DelegatingParameterNameResolver implements ParameterNameResolver
108 	{
109 		private ParameterNameResolver delegate;
110 
111 		public DelegatingParameterNameResolver(final ParameterNameResolver delegate)
112 		{
113 			this.delegate = delegate;
114 		}
115 
116 		public ParameterNameResolver getDelegate()
117 		{
118 			return delegate;
119 		}
120 
121 		/**
122 		 * {@inheritDoc}
123 		 */
124 		public String[] getParameterNames(final Constructor< ? > constructor) throws ReflectionException
125 		{
126 			return delegate.getParameterNames(constructor);
127 		}
128 
129 		/**
130 		 * {@inheritDoc}
131 		 */
132 		public String[] getParameterNames(final Method method) throws ReflectionException
133 		{
134 			return delegate.getParameterNames(method);
135 		}
136 
137 		public void setDelegate(final ParameterNameResolver delegate)
138 		{
139 			this.delegate = delegate;
140 		}
141 	}

151 	private static CollectionFactory _createDefaultCollectionFactory()
152 	{
153 		// if Javolution collection classes are found use them by default
154 		if (ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("javolution.util.FastMap")
155 				&& ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("javolution.util.FastSet")
156 				&& ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("javolution.util.FastTable"))
157 		{
158 			LOG.info("javolution.util collection classes are available.");
159 
160 			return new CollectionFactoryJavalutionImpl();
161 		}
162 		// else if Trove collection classes are found use them by default
163 		else if (ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("gnu.trove.THashMap")
164 				&& ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("gnu.trove.THashSet"))
165 		{
166 			LOG.info("gnu.trove collection classes are available.");
167 
168 			return new CollectionFactoryTroveImpl();
169 		}
170 		// else use JDK collection classes by default
171 		else
172 			return new CollectionFactoryJDKImpl();
173 	}

318 	@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
319 	private void _addChecks(final ClassChecks cc, final ClassConfiguration classCfg)
320 			throws InvalidConfigurationException, ReflectionException
321 	{
322 		if (TRUE.equals(classCfg.overwrite)) cc.clear();
323 
324 		if (classCfg.checkInvariants != null) cc.isCheckInvariants = classCfg.checkInvariants;
325 
326 		// cache the result for better performance
327 		final boolean applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors = TRUE.equals(classCfg.applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors);
328 		final boolean applyFieldConstraintsToSetters = TRUE.equals(classCfg.applyFieldConstraintsToSetters);
329 		final boolean assertParametersNotNull = TRUE.equals(classCfg.assertParametersNotNull);
330 		final NotNullCheck sharedNotNullCheck = assertParametersNotNull ? new NotNullCheck() : null;
331 
332 		try
333 		{
334 			/* ******************************
335 			 * apply object level checks
336 			 * ******************************/
337 			if (classCfg.objectConfiguration != null)
338 			{
339 				final ObjectConfiguration objectCfg = classCfg.objectConfiguration;
340 
341 				if (TRUE.equals(objectCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearObjectChecks();
342 				cc.addObjectChecks(objectCfg.checks);
343 			}
344 
345 			/* ******************************
346 			 * apply field checks
347 			 * ******************************/
348 			if (classCfg.fieldConfigurations != null)
349 				for (final FieldConfiguration fieldCfg : classCfg.fieldConfigurations)
350 				{
351 					final Field field = classCfg.type.getDeclaredField(fieldCfg.name);
352 
353 					if (TRUE.equals(fieldCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearFieldChecks(field);
354 
355 					if (fieldCfg.checks != null && fieldCfg.checks.size() > 0)
356 						cc.addFieldChecks(field, fieldCfg.checks);
357 				}
358 
359 			/* ******************************
360 			 * apply constructor parameter checks
361 			 * ******************************/
362 			if (classCfg.constructorConfigurations != null)
363 				for (final ConstructorConfiguration ctorCfg : classCfg.constructorConfigurations)
364 				{
365 					// ignore constructors without parameters
366 					if (ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations == null) continue;
367 
368 					final Class< ? >[] paramTypes = new Class[ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.size()];
369 
370 					for (int i = 0, l = ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.size(); i < l; i++)
371 						paramTypes[i] = ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.get(i).type;
372 
373 					final Constructor ctor = classCfg.type.getDeclaredConstructor(paramTypes);
374 
375 					if (TRUE.equals(ctorCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearConstructorChecks(ctor);
376 
377 					if (TRUE.equals(ctorCfg.postCheckInvariants)) cc.methodsWithCheckInvariantsPost.add(ctor);
378 
379 					final String[] paramNames = parameterNameResolver.getParameterNames(ctor);
380 
381 					for (int i = 0, l = ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.size(); i < l; i++)
382 					{
383 						final ParameterConfiguration paramCfg = ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.get(i);
384 
385 						if (TRUE.equals(paramCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearConstructorParameterChecks(ctor, i);
386 
387 						if (paramCfg.hasChecks()) cc.addConstructorParameterChecks(ctor, i, paramCfg.checks);
388 
389 						if (paramCfg.hasCheckExclusions())
390 							cc.addConstructorParameterCheckExclusions(ctor, i, paramCfg.checkExclusions);
391 
392 						if (assertParametersNotNull) cc.addConstructorParameterChecks(ctor, i, sharedNotNullCheck);
393 
394 						/* *******************
395 						 * applying field constraints to the single parameter of setter methods 
396 						 * *******************/
397 						if (applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors)
398 						{
399 							final Field field = ReflectionUtils.getField(cc.clazz, paramNames[i]);
400 
401 							// check if a corresponding field has been found
402 							if (field != null && paramTypes[i].isAssignableFrom(field.getType()))
403 							{
404 								final AssertFieldConstraintsCheck check = new AssertFieldConstraintsCheck();
405 								check.setFieldName(field.getName());
406 								cc.addConstructorParameterChecks(ctor, i, check);
407 							}
408 						}
409 					}
410 				}
411 
412 			/* ******************************
413 			 * apply method parameter and return value checks and pre/post conditions
414 			 * ******************************/
415 			if (classCfg.methodConfigurations != null)
416 				for (final MethodConfiguration methodCfg : classCfg.methodConfigurations)
417 				{
418 					/* ******************************
419 					 * determine the method
420 					 * ******************************/
421 					final Method method;
422 
423 					if (methodCfg.parameterConfigurations == null || methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size() == 0)
424 						method = classCfg.type.getDeclaredMethod(methodCfg.name);
425 					else
426 					{
427 						final Class< ? >[] paramTypes = new Class[methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size()];
428 
429 						for (int i = 0, l = methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size(); i < l; i++)
430 							paramTypes[i] = methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.get(i).type;
431 
432 						method = classCfg.type.getDeclaredMethod(methodCfg.name, paramTypes);
433 					}
434 
435 					if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearMethodChecks(method);
436 
437 					/* ******************************
438 					 * applying field constraints to the single parameter of setter methods 
439 					 * ******************************/
440 					if (applyFieldConstraintsToSetters)
441 					{
442 						final Field field = ReflectionUtils.getFieldForSetter(method);
443 
444 						// check if a corresponding field has been found
445 						if (field != null)
446 						{
447 							final AssertFieldConstraintsCheck check = new AssertFieldConstraintsCheck();
448 							check.setFieldName(field.getName());
449 							cc.addMethodParameterChecks(method, 0, check);
450 						}
451 					}
452 
453 					/* ******************************
454 					 * configure parameter constraints
455 					 * ******************************/
456 					if (methodCfg.parameterConfigurations != null && methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size() > 0)
457 						for (int i = 0, l = methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size(); i < l; i++)
458 						{
459 							final ParameterConfiguration paramCfg = methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.get(i);
460 
461 							if (TRUE.equals(paramCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearMethodParameterChecks(method, i);
462 
463 							if (paramCfg.hasChecks()) cc.addMethodParameterChecks(method, i, paramCfg.checks);
464 
465 							if (paramCfg.hasCheckExclusions())
466 								cc.addMethodParameterCheckExclusions(method, i, paramCfg.checkExclusions);
467 
468 							if (assertParametersNotNull) cc.addMethodParameterChecks(method, i, sharedNotNullCheck);
469 						}
470 
471 					/* ******************************
472 					 * configure return value constraints
473 					 * ******************************/
474 					if (methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration != null)
475 					{
476 						if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration.overwrite))
477 							cc.clearMethodReturnValueChecks(method);
478 
479 						if (methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration.checks != null
480 								&& methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration.checks.size() > 0)
481 							cc.addMethodReturnValueChecks(method, methodCfg.isInvariant,
482 									methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration.checks);
483 					}
484 
485 					if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.preCheckInvariants)) cc.methodsWithCheckInvariantsPre.add(method);
486 
487 					/*
488 					 * configure pre conditions
489 					 */
490 					if (methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration != null)
491 					{
492 						if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration.overwrite))
493 							cc.clearMethodPreChecks(method);
494 
495 						if (methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration.checks != null
496 								&& methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration.checks.size() > 0)
497 							cc.addMethodPreChecks(method, methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration.checks);
498 					}
499 
500 					if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.postCheckInvariants)) cc.methodsWithCheckInvariantsPost.add(method);
501 
502 					/*
503 					 * configure post conditions
504 					 */
505 					if (methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration != null)
506 					{
507 						if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration.overwrite))
508 							cc.clearMethodPostChecks(method);
509 
510 						if (methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration.checks != null
511 								&& methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration.checks.size() > 0)
512 							cc.addMethodPostChecks(method, methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration.checks);
513 					}
514 				}
515 		}
516 		catch (final NoSuchMethodException ex)
517 		{
518 			throw new MethodNotFoundException(ex);
519 		}
520 		catch (final NoSuchFieldException ex)
521 		{
522 			throw new FieldNotFoundException(ex);
523 		}
524 	}

526 	private ExpressionLanguage _addExpressionLanguage(final String languageId,
527 			final ExpressionLanguage expressionLanguage) throws IllegalArgumentException
528 	{
529 		Assert.notNull("languageId", languageId);
530 		Assert.notNull("expressionLanguage", expressionLanguage);
531 
532 		LOG.info("Expression language '{1}' registered: {2}", languageId, expressionLanguage);
533 
534 		expressionLanguages.put(languageId, expressionLanguage);
535 		return expressionLanguage;
536 	}
537 
538 	private void _checkConstraint(final List<ConstraintViolation> violations, final Check check,
539 			final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
540 			final String[] profiles)
541 	{
542 		/*
543 		 * special handling of the AssertValid constraint
544 		 */
545 		if (check instanceof AssertValidCheck)
546 		{
547 			checkConstraintAssertValid(violations, (AssertValidCheck) check, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context,
548 					profiles);
549 			return;
550 		}
551 
552 		/*
553 		 * special handling of the FieldConstraints constraint
554 		 */
555 		if (check instanceof AssertConstraintSetCheck)
556 		{
557 			checkConstraintAssertConstraintSet(violations, (AssertConstraintSetCheck) check, validatedObject,
558 					valueToValidate, context, profiles);
559 			return;
560 		}
561 
562 		/*
563 		 * special handling of the FieldConstraints constraint
564 		 */
565 		if (check instanceof AssertFieldConstraintsCheck)
566 		{
567 			checkConstraintAssertFieldConstraints(violations, (AssertFieldConstraintsCheck) check, validatedObject,
568 					valueToValidate, context, profiles);
569 			return;
570 		}
571 
572 		/*
573 		 * standard constraints handling
574 		 */
575 		if (!check.isSatisfied(validatedObject, valueToValidate, context, this))
576 		{
577 			final String errorMessage = renderMessage(context, valueToValidate, check.getMessage(), check
578 					.getMessageVariables());
579 			violations.add(new ConstraintViolation(check, errorMessage, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context));
580 		}
581 	}
582 
583 	private ExpressionLanguage _initializeDefaultEL(final String languageId)
584 	{
585 		// JavaScript support
586 		if (("javascript".equals(languageId) || "js".equals(languageId))
587 				&& ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.mozilla.javascript.Context"))
588 			return _addExpressionLanguage("js", _addExpressionLanguage("javascript",
589 					new ExpressionLanguageJavaScriptImpl()));
590 
591 		// Groovy support
592 		else if ("groovy".equals(languageId) && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("groovy.lang.Binding"))
593 			return _addExpressionLanguage("groovy", new ExpressionLanguageGroovyImpl());
594 
595 		// BeanShell support
596 		else if (("beanshell".equals(languageId) || "bsh".equals(languageId))
597 				&& ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("bsh.Interpreter"))
598 			return _addExpressionLanguage("beanshell", _addExpressionLanguage("bsh",
599 					new ExpressionLanguageBeanShellImpl()));
600 
601 		// OGNL support
602 		else if ("ognl".equals(languageId) && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("ognl.Ognl"))
603 			return _addExpressionLanguage("ognl", new ExpressionLanguageOGNLImpl());
604 
605 		// MVEL2 support
606 		else if ("mvel".equals(languageId) && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.mvel2.MVEL"))
607 			return _addExpressionLanguage("mvel", new ExpressionLanguageMVELImpl());
608 
609 		// JRuby support
610 		else if (("jruby".equals(languageId) || "ruby".equals(languageId))
611 				&& ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.jruby.Ruby"))
612 			return _addExpressionLanguage("jruby", _addExpressionLanguage("ruby", new ExpressionLanguageJRubyImpl()));
613 
614 		// JEXL support
615 		else if ("jexl".equals(languageId)
616 				&& ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.apache.commons.jexl.ExpressionFactory"))
617 			return _addExpressionLanguage("jexl", new ExpressionLanguageJEXLImpl());
618 
619 		return null;
620 	}
621 
622 	/**
623 	 * validate validatedObject based on the constraints of the given class 
624 	 */
625 	private void _validateObjectInvariants(final Object validatedObject, final Class< ? > clazz,
626 			final List<ConstraintViolation> violations, final String[] profiles) throws ValidationFailedException
627 	{
628 		assert validatedObject != null;
629 		assert clazz != null;
630 		assert violations != null;
631 
632 		// abort if the root class has been reached
633 		if (clazz == Object.class) return;
634 
635 		try
636 		{
637 			final ClassChecks cc = getClassChecks(clazz);
638 
639 			// validate field constraints
640 			for (final Field field : cc.constrainedFields)
641 			{
642 				final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForFields.get(field);
643 
644 				if (checks != null && checks.size() > 0)
645 				{
646 					final Object valueToValidate = ReflectionUtils.getFieldValue(field, validatedObject);
647 					final FieldContext ctx = ContextCache.getFieldContext(field);
648 
649 					for (final Check check : checks)
650 						checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, valueToValidate, ctx, profiles, false);
651 				}
652 			}
653 
654 			// validate constraints on getter methods
655 			for (final Method getter : cc.constrainedMethods)
656 			{
657 				final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForMethodReturnValues.get(getter);
658 
659 				if (checks != null && checks.size() > 0)
660 				{
661 					final Object valueToValidate = ReflectionUtils.invokeMethod(getter, validatedObject);
662 					final MethodReturnValueContext ctx = ContextCache.getMethodReturnValueContext(getter);
663 
664 					for (final Check check : checks)
665 						checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, valueToValidate, ctx, profiles, false);
666 				}
667 			}
668 
669 			// validate object constraints
670 			if (cc.checksForObject.size() > 0)
671 			{
672 				final ClassContext ctx = ContextCache.getClassContext(clazz);
673 				for (final Check check : cc.checksForObject)
674 					checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, validatedObject, ctx, profiles, false);
675 			}
676 
677 			// if the super class is annotated to be validatable also validate it against the object
678 			_validateObjectInvariants(validatedObject, clazz.getSuperclass(), violations, profiles);
679 		}
680 		catch (final OValException ex)
681 		{
682 			throw new ValidationFailedException("Object validation failed. Class: " + clazz + " Validated object: "
683 					+ validatedObject, ex);
684 		}
685 	}
686 
687 	/**
688 	 * Validates the static field and static getter constrains of the given class.
689 	 * Constraints specified for super classes are not taken in account.
690 	 */
691 	private void _validateStaticInvariants(final Class< ? > validatedClass, final List<ConstraintViolation> violations,
692 			final String[] profiles) throws ValidationFailedException
693 	{
694 		assert validatedClass != null;
695 		assert violations != null;
696 
697 		final ClassChecks cc = getClassChecks(validatedClass);
698 
699 		// validate static field constraints
700 		for (final Field field : cc.constrainedStaticFields)
701 		{
702 			final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForFields.get(field);
703 
704 			if (checks != null && checks.size() > 0)
705 			{
706 				final Object valueToValidate = ReflectionUtils.getFieldValue(field, null);
707 				final FieldContext context = ContextCache.getFieldContext(field);
708 
709 				for (final Check check : checks)
710 					checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedClass, valueToValidate, context, profiles, false);
711 			}
712 		}
713 
714 		// validate constraints on getter methods
715 		for (final Method getter : cc.constrainedStaticMethods)
716 		{
717 			final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForMethodReturnValues.get(getter);
718 
719 			if (checks != null && checks.size() > 0)
720 			{
721 				final Object valueToValidate = ReflectionUtils.invokeMethod(getter, null);
722 				final MethodReturnValueContext context = ContextCache.getMethodReturnValueContext(getter);
723 
724 				for (final Check check : checks)
725 					checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedClass, valueToValidate, context, profiles, false);
726 			}
727 		}
728 	}

840 	protected void checkConstraint(final List<ConstraintViolation> violations, final Check check,
841 			final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
842 			final String[] profiles, final boolean isContainerValue) throws OValException
843 	{
844 		if (!isAnyProfileEnabled(check.getProfiles(), profiles)) return;
845 
846 		if (!check.isActive(validatedObject, valueToValidate, this)) return;
847 
848 		final ConstraintTarget[] targets = check.getAppliesTo();
849 
850 		final Class< ? > compileTimeType = context.getCompileTimeType();
851 
852 		final boolean isCollection = valueToValidate != null ? //
853 				valueToValidate instanceof Collection< ? > : //
854 				compileTimeType != null && Collection.class.isAssignableFrom(compileTimeType);
855 		final boolean isMap = !isCollection && //
856 				(valueToValidate != null ? //
857 						valueToValidate instanceof Map< ? , ? > : //
858 						compileTimeType != null && Map.class.isAssignableFrom(compileTimeType));
859 		final boolean isArray = !isCollection && !isMap && //
860 				(valueToValidate != null ? // 
861 						valueToValidate.getClass().isArray() : //
862 						compileTimeType != null && compileTimeType.isArray());
863 		final boolean isContainer = isCollection || isMap || isArray;
864 
865 		if (isContainer && valueToValidate != null)
866 			if (isCollection)
867 			{
868 				if (ArrayUtils.containsSame(targets, ConstraintTarget.VALUES))
869 					for (final Object item : (Collection< ? >) valueToValidate)
870 						checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, item, context, profiles, true);
871 			}
872 			else if (isMap)
873 			{
874 				if (ArrayUtils.containsSame(targets, ConstraintTarget.KEYS))
875 					for (final Object item : ((Map< ? , ? >) valueToValidate).keySet())
876 						checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, item, context, profiles, true);
877 
878 				if (ArrayUtils.containsSame(targets, ConstraintTarget.VALUES))
879 					for (final Object item : ((Map< ? , ? >) valueToValidate).values())
880 						checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, item, context, profiles, true);
881 			}
882 			else if (valueToValidate != null && ArrayUtils.containsSame(targets, ConstraintTarget.VALUES))
883 				for (final Object item : ArrayUtils.arrayToList(valueToValidate))
884 					checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, item, context, profiles, true);
885 		if (isContainerValue || !isContainer || isContainer
886 				&& ArrayUtils.containsSame(targets, ConstraintTarget.CONTAINER))
887 			_checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context, profiles);
888 	}
889 
890 	protected void checkConstraintAssertConstraintSet(final List<ConstraintViolation> violations,
891 			final AssertConstraintSetCheck check, final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate,
892 			final OValContext context, final String[] profiles) throws OValException
893 	{
894 		final ConstraintSet cs = getConstraintSet(check.getId());
895 
896 		if (cs == null) throw new UndefinedConstraintSetException(check.getId());
897 
898 		final Collection<Check> referencedChecks = cs.getChecks();
899 
900 		if (referencedChecks != null && referencedChecks.size() > 0)
901 			for (final Check referencedCheck : referencedChecks)
902 				checkConstraint(violations, referencedCheck, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context, profiles, false);
903 	}
904 
905 	protected void checkConstraintAssertFieldConstraints(final List<ConstraintViolation> violations,
906 			final AssertFieldConstraintsCheck check, final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate,
907 			final OValContext context, final String[] profiles) throws OValException
908 	{
909 		final Class< ? > targetClass;
910 
911 		/*
912 		 * set the targetClass based on the validation context
913 		 */
914 		if (check.getDeclaringClass() != null && check.getDeclaringClass() != Void.class)
915 			targetClass = check.getDeclaringClass();
916 		else if (context instanceof ConstructorParameterContext)
917 			// the class declaring the field must either be the class declaring the constructor or one of its super
918 			// classes
919 			targetClass = ((ConstructorParameterContext) context).getConstructor().getDeclaringClass();
920 		else if (context instanceof MethodParameterContext)
921 			// the class declaring the field must either be the class declaring the method or one of its super classes
922 			targetClass = ((MethodParameterContext) context).getMethod().getDeclaringClass();
923 		else if (context instanceof MethodReturnValueContext)
924 			// the class declaring the field must either be the class declaring the getter or one of its super classes
925 			targetClass = ((MethodReturnValueContext) context).getMethod().getDeclaringClass();
926 		else
927 			// the lowest class that is expected to declare the field (or one of its super classes)
928 			targetClass = validatedObject.getClass();
929 
930 		// the name of the field whose constraints shall be used
931 		String fieldName = check.getFieldName();
932 
933 		/*
934 		 * calculate the field name based on the validation context if the @AssertFieldConstraints constraint didn't specify the field name
935 		 */
936 		if (fieldName == null || fieldName.length() == 0)
937 			if (context instanceof ConstructorParameterContext)
938 				fieldName = ((ConstructorParameterContext) context).getParameterName();
939 			else if (context instanceof MethodParameterContext)
940 				fieldName = ((MethodParameterContext) context).getParameterName();
941 			else if (context instanceof MethodReturnValueContext)
942 				fieldName = ReflectionUtils.guessFieldName(((MethodReturnValueContext) context).getMethod());
943 
944 		/*
945 		 * find the field based on fieldName and targetClass
946 		 */
947 		final Field field = ReflectionUtils.getFieldRecursive(targetClass, fieldName);
948 
949 		if (field == null)
950 			throw new FieldNotFoundException("Field <" + fieldName + "> not found in class <" + targetClass
951 					+ "> or its super classes.");
952 
953 		final ClassChecks cc = getClassChecks(field.getDeclaringClass());
954 		final Collection<Check> referencedChecks = cc.checksForFields.get(field);
955 		if (referencedChecks != null && referencedChecks.size() > 0)
956 			for (final Check referencedCheck : referencedChecks)
957 				checkConstraint(violations, referencedCheck, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context, profiles, false);
958 	}
959 
960 	protected void checkConstraintAssertValid(final List<ConstraintViolation> violations, final AssertValidCheck check,
961 			final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
962 			final String[] profiles) throws OValException
963 	{
964 		if (valueToValidate == null) return;
965 
966 		// ignore circular dependencies
967 		if (isCurrentlyValidated(valueToValidate)) return;
968 
969 		final List<ConstraintViolation> additionalViolations = collectionFactory.createList();
970 		validateInvariants(valueToValidate, additionalViolations, profiles);
971 
972 		if (additionalViolations.size() != 0)
973 		{
974 			final String errorMessage = renderMessage(context, valueToValidate, check.getMessage(), check
975 					.getMessageVariables());
976 
977 			violations.add(new ConstraintViolation(check, errorMessage, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context,
978 					additionalViolations));
979 		}
980 	}

1082 	/**
1083 	 * Returns the ClassChecks object for the particular class,
1084 	 * allowing you to modify the checks
1085 	 * 
1086 	 * @param clazz cannot be null
1087 	 * @return returns the ClassChecks for the given class
1088 	 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if <code>clazz == null</code>
1089 	 */
1090 	protected ClassChecks getClassChecks(final Class< ? > clazz) throws IllegalArgumentException,
1091 			InvalidConfigurationException, ReflectionException
1092 	{
1093 		Assert.notNull("clazz", clazz);
1094 
1095 		synchronized (checksByClass)
1096 		{
1097 			ClassChecks cc = checksByClass.get(clazz);
1098 
1099 			if (cc == null)
1100 			{
1101 				cc = new ClassChecks(clazz, parameterNameResolver);
1102 
1103 				for (final Configurer configurer : configurers)
1104 				{
1105 					final ClassConfiguration classConfig = configurer.getClassConfiguration(clazz);
1106 					if (classConfig != null) _addChecks(cc, classConfig);
1107 				}
1108 
1109 				checksByClass.put(clazz, cc);
1110 			}
1111 
1112 			return cc;
1113 		}
1114 	}

1124 	/**
1125 	 * Returns the given constraint set.
1126 	 * 
1127 	 * @param constraintSetId the id of the constraint set to retrieve
1128 	 * @return the constraint set or null if not found
1129 	 * @throws InvalidConfigurationException
1130 	 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if <code>constraintSetId</code> is null
1131 	 */
1132 	public ConstraintSet getConstraintSet(final String constraintSetId) throws InvalidConfigurationException,
1133 			IllegalArgumentException
1134 	{
1135 		Assert.notNull("constraintSetsById", constraintSetsById);
1136 		synchronized (constraintSetsById)
1137 		{
1138 			ConstraintSet cs = constraintSetsById.get(constraintSetId);
1139 
1140 			if (cs == null) for (final Configurer configurer : configurers)
1141 			{
1142 				final ConstraintSetConfiguration csc = configurer.getConstraintSetConfiguration(constraintSetId);
1143 				if (csc != null)
1144 				{
1145 					cs = new ConstraintSet(csc.id);
1146 					cs.setChecks(csc.checks);
1147 
1148 					addConstraintSet(cs, csc.overwrite != null && csc.overwrite);
1149 				}
1150 			}
1151 			return cs;
1152 		}
1153 	}

1184 	/**
1185 	 * Determines if at least one of the given profiles is enabled
1186 	 * 
1187 	 * @param profilesOfCheck
1188 	 * @param enabledProfiles optional array of profiles (can be null)
1189 	 * @return Returns true if at least one of the given profiles is enabled. 
1190 	 */
1191 	protected boolean isAnyProfileEnabled(final String[] profilesOfCheck, final String[] enabledProfiles)
1192 	{
1193 		if (enabledProfiles == null)
1194 		{
1195 			// use the global profile configuration
1196 			if (profilesOfCheck == null || profilesOfCheck.length == 0) return isProfileEnabled("default");
1197 
1198 			for (final String profile : profilesOfCheck)
1199 				if (isProfileEnabled(profile)) return true;
1200 		}
1201 		else
1202 		{
1203 			// use the local profile configuration
1204 			if (profilesOfCheck == null || profilesOfCheck.length == 0)
1205 				return ArrayUtils.containsEqual(enabledProfiles, "default");
1206 
1207 			for (final String profile : profilesOfCheck)
1208 				if (ArrayUtils.containsEqual(enabledProfiles, profile)) return true;
1209 		}
1210 		return false;
1211 	}

1214 	 * Determines if the given object is currently validated in the current thread
1215 	 * 
1216 	 * @param object
1217 	 * @return Returns true if the given object is currently validated in the current thread.
1218 	 */
1219 	protected boolean isCurrentlyValidated(final Object object)
1220 	{
1221 		Assert.notNull("object", object);
1222 		return currentlyValidatedObjects.get().getLast().contains(object);
1223 	}

1225 	/**
1226 	 * Determines if the given profile is enabled.
1227 	 * 
1228 	 * @param profileId
1229 	 * @return Returns true if the given profile is enabled.
1230 	 */
1231 	public boolean isProfileEnabled(final String profileId)
1232 	{
1233 		Assert.notNull("profileId", profileId);
1234 		if (isProfilesFeatureUsed)
1235 		{
1236 			if (isAllProfilesEnabledByDefault) return !disabledProfiles.contains(profileId);
1237 
1238 			return enabledProfiles.contains(profileId);
1239 		}
1240 		return true;
1241 	}

1259 	/**
1260 	 * Removes object-level constraint checks 
1261 	 *  
1262 	 * @param clazz
1263 	 * @param checks
1264 	 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if <code>clazz == null</code> or <code>checks == null</code> or checks is empty 
1265 	 */
1266 	public void removeChecks(final Class< ? > clazz, final Check... checks) throws IllegalArgumentException
1267 	{

1320 	protected String renderMessage(final OValContext context, final Object value, final String messageKey,
1321 			final Map<String, ? > messageValues)
1322 	{
1323 		String message = MessageRenderer.renderMessage(messageKey, messageValues);
1324 
1325 		// if there are no place holders in the message simply return it
1326 		if (message.indexOf('{') == -1) return message;
1327 
1328 		message = StringUtils.replaceAll(message, "{context}", contextRenderer.render(context));
1329 		message = StringUtils.replaceAll(message, "{invalidValue}", messageValueFormatter.format(value));
1330 
1331 		return message;
1332 	}

1398 	/**
1399 	 * {@inheritDoc}
1400 	 */
1401 	public List<ConstraintViolation> validateFieldValue(final Object validatedObject, final Field validatedField,
1402 			final Object fieldValueToValidate) throws IllegalArgumentException, ValidationFailedException
1403 	{
1404 		Assert.notNull("validatedObject", validatedObject);
1405 		Assert.notNull("validatedField", validatedField);
1406 
1407 		// create a new set for this validation cycle
1408 		currentlyValidatedObjects.get().add(new IdentitySet<Object>(4));
1409 		try
1410 		{
1411 			final ClassChecks cc = getClassChecks(validatedField.getDeclaringClass());
1412 			final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForFields.get(validatedField);
1413 
1414 			final List<ConstraintViolation> violations = collectionFactory.createList();
1415 
1416 			if (checks == null || checks.size() == 0) return violations;
1417 
1418 			final FieldContext context = ContextCache.getFieldContext(validatedField);
1419 
1420 			for (final Check check : checks)
1421 				checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, fieldValueToValidate, context, null, false);
1422 			return violations;
1423 		}
1424 		catch (final OValException ex)
1425 		{
1426 			throw new ValidationFailedException("Field validation failed. Field: " + validatedField
1427 					+ " Validated object: " + validatedObject, ex);
1428 		}
1429 		finally
1430 		{
1431 			// remove the set
1432 			currentlyValidatedObjects.get().removeLast();
1433 		}
1434 
1435 	}

1437 	/**
1438 	 * validates the field and getter constrains of the given object.
1439 	 * if the given object is a class the static fields and getters
1440 	 * are validated.
1441 	 * 
1442 	 * @param validatedObject the object to validate, cannot be null
1443 	 * @throws ValidationFailedException
1444 	 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if <code>validatedObject == null</code>
1445 	 */
1446 	protected void validateInvariants(final Object validatedObject, final List<ConstraintViolation> violations,
1447 			final String[] profiles) throws IllegalArgumentException, ValidationFailedException
1448 	{
1449 		Assert.notNull("validatedObject", validatedObject);
1450 
1451 		currentlyValidatedObjects.get().getLast().add(validatedObject);
1452 		if (validatedObject instanceof Class< ? >)
1453 			_validateStaticInvariants((Class< ? >) validatedObject, violations, profiles);
1454 		else
1455 			_validateObjectInvariants(validatedObject, validatedObject.getClass(), violations, profiles);
1456 	}
